name: beeroclock-site
description: A website which tells you where in the world it is beer o'clock (5PM) at the moment

scripts.js: babel --presets=es2015,babili -d build/js js && babel --presets=es2015,babili --out-file build/sw.js sw.js
scripts.html: htmlmin -o build/index.html index.html && htmlmin -o build/404.html 404.html && htmlmin -o build/500.html 500.html
scripts.other: cp robots.txt humans.txt manifest.json browserconfig.xml sitemap.xml build/
scripts.prebuild: rimraf build/ && mkdir build && cd build && mkdir js style img
scripts.build: npm run js && npm run css && npm run html && npm run img && npm run other
